wunderground.updateFrequenty_explanation: When no personal Weather Underground API key is specified, the update frequenty is 60 minutes minimal.

generic.unitChange_explanation: If the units are changed, all current Insights logs will be deleted!

location.manualLocation_explanation: Use the fields below to specify an location for the weather data.
location.city: City (or empty when using station ID)

messages.unable_get_location: Unable to get Homey's location, please try again or specify a location manually.
